summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AppleCare+ activation management system. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend mostly functional with minor data loading issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Shows 'Loading...' indefinitely instead of displaying requests data
Shows loading spinner indefinitely when navigating to request details

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not properly fetching requests data despite backend API working

passed_tests: Login functionality with default credentials (admin@applecare.com / admin123)
Dashboard stats cards display (Total, Pending, Payment Pending, Activated)
New Activation Request form with all required fields
Date picker for device activation date
Settings page with all 4 tabs (Email, osTicket, Plans, Password)
CRUD operations for plans and requests
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend data loading issue: Dashboard requests table shows 'Loading...' indefinitely. Backend API /api/activation-requests works correctly, but frontend is not properly displaying the data. Check authentication headers, CORS configuration, or frontend state management in Dashboard.js
